title: Deep Sea Nami bugged?
body:
I played a game today using Deep Sea Nami and I noticed the angler fish light that sticks out from her head isn't there in game since the patch.

https://i.imgur.com/CgrHgD6.png

Here's a screenshot I took in a custom game to show that the light is gone. The stem(for lack of a better word) looks like it sunk into her head and the light is not there. Strangely enough though it pops out during her dance animation.

https://i.imgur.com/HIhIZTY.png

Idk if this is intentional or not but I knew something was fishy(hue) when I loaded into the game earlier.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BqdwZuYqgI4      Skin spotlight video from the skin's release for reference. Ty for your time friends

replies.body:
Hi! 

Thanks for the detailed bug! <3 

We're aware of the issue and are in the process of fixing it! It seems to be a weighting issue with her lure, which is causing it to appear and disappear during several animations. :c
Hey thanks for the response! That's good to hear that the bug is being fixed. You guys are awesome keep up the great work :)
Yeah, of course! I love Nami, and this was something I immediately noticed, haha. We're working on a fix at the moment! :)
THANK YOU IM NOT THE ONLY ONE. I'm a Nami main and that's my fave skin on her and it was driving me nuts it needs to be fixed not only is it my favorite but its the most expensive one.
